name: A light in the dark (itch) (johannajaniszewski)
description:
You find yourself awaking in the middle of the night. Very thirsty!

You really want to find something to drink, but you are afraid of the monsters so you light up a small candle. You look for your water, but be warned! Night monsters will wake up if candle light shines upon them. ~ Move the candle with the mouse. Use arrow up and down for volume!
